description: Try our easy to follow Pecan-brittle Ice-cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pecan-brittle Ice-cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the brittle, preheat oven to 150°C. Line a tray with baking paper. Scatter pecans over in a single layer. Bake for 10 minutes or until lightly toasted. Cool.
Stir sugar and 1/4 cup water in a saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Boil until it turns a deep golden colour. Pour over pecans and leave to set. Break into small pieces.
To make ice-cream, combine thickened cream and syrup in a saucepan with cinnamon and vanilla. Bring to the boil. Remove from heat. Set aside for 10 minutes.

Beat egg yolks and sugar in a bowl until pale and thick. Strain the cream mixture, whisking, into egg mixture. Return to pan and stir over low heat until custard thickens. Chill. Churn in an ice-cream maker until set. Stir in brittle, transfer to a container and freeze until firm.

To make biscuits, preheat oven to 180°C. Process dry ingredients in a food processor until combined. Combine butter, golden syrup and milk in a separate bowl, and add to flour mixture in food processor. Process until a dough forms.

Roll out dough between 2 sheets of baking paper and chill for 10 minutes. Cut out rounds using an 8cm-fluted cutter. Transfer to a tray, lined with baking paper, and bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Set aside to cool.
Use the 8cm cutter to make an ice-cream portion. Sandwich ice-cream between biscuits and serve.
